casebody.data:
Wendell D. Z. Reese, a Minor, by Guy F. Reese, his Father and Next Friend, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. Margaret Laymon, Defendant-Appellee.Gen. No. 9,814.Opinion filed March 11, 1952;rehearing denied May 6, 1952;

released for publication May 6, 1952.

H. F. Simonson, and Norval D. Hodges, for appellant;Henry I. Green, Darius B. Phebus, and Hurshal C. Tummelson, for appellee. Presiding Justice O’Connor.

Opinion by Not to be published in full.
